resources.string:
This will erase all the data on your phone’s internal storage", including:
"
Your account" "
System and app data and settings" "
Downloaded apps
All personal information and downloaded apps will be erased, and this action cannot be undone!
Based on the gravity sensor, the interface changes state to make single hand use easier.
If you forget your screen unlock password, you can unlock the screen by logging into your Letv account.
Number-only passwords must be longer than %s digits.
Soft: protects eyes, suitable for long-time phone use
Use Internet time zone and time
We will collect feedback on your use of this product in order to improve our products and customer service
When connecting to Wi-Fi P2P or Bluetooth devices, people nearby will be able to see the name of your phone.
Access notification bar when password is locked
Show lockscreen interface based on gravity sensor
"Wake up your phone by saying 'Hi, Xiao Le'"
Slide down to turn on flashlight
Adjust the size and distribution of content displayed on the screen
Select different screen display color styles
You must reboot your phone to switch scale modes. Are you sure you want to switch?
Allow adb install commands to install apps in the background
Smart enhancement to screen color saturation and smoothness
You can scan and clear large files
When locked, the proximity sensor will be activated to avoid unintentional calls or phone usage
Draining the battery in the background. Please close when not in use.
%d app(s) are draining the battery in the background
Please close when not in use.
No high power-consuming apps in the background found
Power-consuming apps in the background found
The following apps are draining the battery. Please close them when not in use.
%s apps draining the battery in the background are cleared
Auto enable on low battery level
Dynamically control features such as vibration and network sync based on the scenario
Limit features such as dynamic visual effects and network access
Only basic apps such as calling and messaging are kept on, while network is disabled
To use connectivity features such as Wi-Fi during the Airplane mode, turn them on manually in Settings or on the notification panel.
"No network connection. Please connect to a network to view or open the link below in the browser: http://xpage.g.scloud.letv.com/web/agree"
Enabling it allows for more precise positioning but increases battery usage
Letv account verification is required for phone resetting. Please enter your account password.

"You can use a fingerprint to unlock the screen quickly. In order to protect your privacy, the fingerprint unlock feature can only be used when the unlock method is set to \"simple password\" or \"complex password\". "
Place your finger on the fingerprint reader on the back of the phone, and lift it when you feel the vibration and place it again.
The fingerprint already exists, please try another finger.
The fingerprint unlock feature can only be used when the unlock method is set to \"PIN\" or \"Password\".
In camera screen, press and hold the fingerprint sensor to take photos or capture videos.
Place your finger on the fingerprint reader on the back of the phone.
Place your finger on the fingerprint reader and lift it when you feel the vibration.
You haven’t added any fingerprints. Add one now?
Finger unlock is enabled, you can not use this option
Repeatedly lift and place your finger on designated area for completion
Finger unlock is enabled, you can not use this option
The Back key is on the right by default and on the left in left-hand mode
The WeChat app is not installed. Please install it before enabling the alternate account
WeChat Avatar is enabled. Tap to launch the app
Allow you to log into two accounts in different versions of the same app installed
Unable to search with the screen locked
Battery is below 20%. Please charge and retry to restore to factory settings.
Unable to use data network currently. Please switch data card or activate the disabled SIM card
Connecting to Wi-Fi can help you set up your phone better
启用后会切换为静音模式
請增加按壓力度，確保指紋錄入清晰
When enabled, the virtual button on bottom left will be changed to Back, while the one on bottom right to Multitask.
"After enabling, once you reach the data limit, the system will disable your data connection"
Data connection must be enabled for the portable Wi-Fi hotspot to work properly.
Wireless display is connecting, please disconnect and reconnect!
Connect to display wirelessly and display images
Please hold the switch to create a new VPN
There are illegal characters in the password, please check and retry.
Please press the WPS button on the router.

Please turn off Bluetooth and retry
No need, you are already a developer.
Servez à ce monsieur une bière et des kiwis.
Visible to all nearby Bluetooth devices (%1$s)
Visible to all nearby Bluetooth devices
Not visible to other Bluetooth devices
Prevent use of the bluetooth dialer when the screen is locked
No name set, using account name
This will end your connection with:%1$s
"You don't have permission to change Bluetooth settings."
%1$s is visible to nearby devices while Bluetooth Settings is open.
No nearby Bluetooth devices were found.
An app wants to turn on Bluetooth.
An app wants to make your phone visible to other Bluetooth devices for %1$d seconds.
An app wants to make your phone visible to other Bluetooth devices. You can change this later in Bluetooth settings.
%1$s wants to turn on Bluetooth broadcasting to communicate with other devices nearby. You can change this later in Bluetooth settings.
%1$s wants to turn on Bluetooth and Bluetooth broadcasting to communicate with other devices nearby. You can change this later in Bluetooth settings.

"When this feature is turned on, your phone can communicate with other devices nearby.
Broadcasting uses low-power Bluetooth signals."
An app wants to turn on Bluetooth and make your phone visible to other devices for %1$d seconds.
An app wants to turn on Bluetooth and make your phone visible to other devices. You can change this later in Bluetooth settings.
Do you want to connect to \"%1$s\"?
%1$s wants to access your contacts and call history. Give access to %2$s?
%1$s wants to access your messages. Give access to %2$s?
"The exclusion list you typed isn't properly formatted. Type a comma-separated list of excluded domains."
You need to complete the port field.
The port field must be empty if the host field is empty.
The HTTP proxy is used by the browser but may not be used by the other apps.
Number of PPP reset since boot:
Changes take effect when USB cable is reconnected.
USB storage is being used as a mass storage device.
"It's now safe to remove the USB storage."
USB storage was removed while still in use!
Manage Wi‑Fi, Bluetooth, airplane mode, cellular networks, & VPNs
Allow data usage over cellular network

Connect to data services when roaming
You have lost data connectivity because you left your home network with data roaming turned off.
When you allow data roaming, you may incur significant roaming charges!

"When you allow data roaming, you may incur significant roaming charges!
This setting affects all users on this phone."
Set date, time, time zone, & formats
%1$s after sleep, except when kept unlocked by %2$s
Display custom text on lock screen
A new day should begin with something positive!
Show user info on lock screen
Show profile info on lock screen
Set My Location, screen unlock, SIM card lock, credential storage lock
Set My Location, screen unlock, credential storage lock

"You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded apps and their data, media, and other files. After you encrypt your phone, assuming you've set up a screen lock (that is, a pattern or numeric PIN or password), you'll need to unlock the screen to decrypt the phone every time you power it on. The only other way to decrypt is to perform a factory data reset, erasing all your data.
Encryption takes an hour or more. You must start with a charged battery and keep your phone plugged in throughout the process. If you interrupt it, you'll lose some or all of your data."
Charge your battery and try again.
Plug in your charger and try again.
No lock screen PIN or password
You need to set a lock screen PIN or password before you can start encryption.
You need to draw your unlock pattern to confirm encrypting your device.
"The encryption operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you'll lose data. Encryption takes an hour or more, during which the phone will restart several times."
Wait while your phone is being encrypted. ^1% complete.
Wait while your phone is being encrypted. Time remaining: ^1
Warning: Your device will be wiped after ^1 more failed attempts to be unlocked!

"Encryption was interrupted and can't complete. As a result, the data on your phone is no longer accessible.
To resume using your phone, you need to perform a factory reset. When you set up your phone after the reset, you'll have an opportunity to restore any data that was backed up to your Google Account."

"The password you entered is correct, but unfortunately your data is corrupt.
To resume using your phone, you need to perform a factory reset. When you set up your phone after the reset, you'll have an opportunity to restore any data that was backed up to your Google Account."
Change or disable pattern, PIN, or password security
Choose a method to lock the screen
"When Face Unlock can't see you, how do you want to unlock?"
Combination of at least four characters
Disabled by administrator, encryption policy, or credential storage
Password must be at least %d characters
Password must be fewer than %d characters.
"The device manager doesn't allow using recently used simple passwords."
An ascending, descending or repeated sequence of digits is forbidden
To use, first set a screen lock
Manage connections, set device name & discoverability
Type the pairing code then press Return or Enter
You may also need to type this PIN on the other device.
You may also need to type this passkey on the other device.

To pair with:
%1$s

Make sure it is showing this passkey:
%2$s

To pair with:
%1$s

Type on it:
%2$s, then press Return or Enter.
Pairing grants access to your contacts and call history when connected.
"Couldn't pair with %1$s because of an incorrect PIN or passkey."
%1$s wants to access your contacts and call history.
%1$s wants to pair with Bluetooth. When connected, it will have access to your contacts and call history.
When Bluetooth is turned on, your device can communicate with other nearby Bluetooth devices.
%1$s will be disconnected from media audio.
%1$s will be disconnected from handsfree audio.
%1$s will be disconnected from input device.
Internet access via %1$s will be disconnected.
"%1$s will be disconnected from sharing this phone's Internet connection."
Not connected to file transfer server
Connected to device for Internet access
Sharing local Internet connection with device
If you enable this option, make sure that Bluetooth tethering is enabled on the personal hotspot
Automatically connect to available networks with a Wi‑Fi Assistant.
%1$s automatically connects you to the best available Wi‑Fi
Allow data exchange when the phone touches another device
Ready to transmit app content via NFC
Unavailable because NFC is turned off

"When this feature is turned on, you can beam app content to another NFC-capable device by holding the devices close together. For example, you can beam Browser pages, YouTube videos, People contacts, and more.
Just bring the devices together (typically back to back) and then touch your screen. The app determines what gets beamed."
Allow apps on other devices to discover apps on this device
Set up & manage wireless access points
Notify whenever a public network is available
"Don't use a Wi‑Fi network unless it has a good Internet connection"
Only use networks that have a good Internet connection
"Let Google's location service and other apps scan for networks, even when Wi‑Fi is off"
To improve app’s location accuracy, Google and other apps may scan for nearby networks even when Wi-Fi is off. If you don’t want this to happen, go to: Advanced > Scanning always available
"Apps may scan for nearby networks, even when Wi-Fi is off. If you don't want this to happen, go to Advanced > Scanning always available."
There was a problem changing the setting
Minimize battery usage when Wi‑Fi is on
To see available networks turn on Wi-Fi.
"You don't have permission to change the Wi‑Fi network."
To complete setup, your tablet needs access to Wi‑Fi. After setup, you can switch between cellular data and Wi‑Fi.
Press the Wi‑Fi Protected Setup button on your router. It may be called \"WPS\" or contain this symbol:
Enter pin %1$s on your Wi‑Fi router. The setup can take up to two minutes to complete.
WPS succeeded. Connecting to the network…
WPS is already in progress and can take up to two minutes to complete
WPS failed. Please try again in a few minutes.
The wireless router security setting (WEP) is not supported
The wireless router security setting (TKIP) is not supported
Another WPS session was detected. Please try again in a few minutes.
Poor network state, click to reconnect

"To improve location accuracy and for other purposes, %1$s wants to turn on network scanning, even when Wi-Fi is off.
Allow this for all apps that want to scan?"
To turn this off, go to Advanced in the overflow menu.
%1$s requires you to sign in online before you connect to the network.
WARNING: if you skip Wi‑Fi, your phone will only use cellular data for initial downloads and updates. To avoid possible data charges, connect to Wi‑Fi.
"WARNING: If you skip Wi‑Fi, your phone won't have an Internet connection to use for any initial downloads or updates."
The phone was unable to connect to this Wi‑Fi network.
Specify the frequency range of operation
There was a problem setting the frequency band.
Type a network prefix length between 0 and 32.
If you disconnect, your connection with %1$s will end.
Your connection(s) with %1$s device(s) will also be interrupted.
Use cellular connection to provide Wi‑Fi network
AndroidAP WPA2 PSK portable Wi‑Fi hotspot
Use incoming call volume for notifications
Set volume for music and videos
Audio settings for the attached dock

You can transfer pictures with a computer, and transfer any files with a computer that doesn’t support MTP

Priority app notifications will be displayed on top

If you unmount the USB storage, some apps you are using will stop and may be unavailable until you remount the USB storage.

"Couldn't unmount USB storage. Try again later."
